section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.content1: Quote24 is a service provided by our company in accordance with these terms (hereinafter referred to as "the Service"). By using Quote24, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to accept all the terms and conditions herein. If you are under eighteen years of age, you may only use the Service after your parent or guardian has read, understood, and agreed that you will comply with all the terms.
section1.content2: You must agree to these terms before using the Service. If you do not accept these terms, you may not use the Service. You understand and agree that when using the Service, your actions such as clicking agree or confirm buttons on various service and feature pages constitute your formal expression of intent. We may modify or change the content of these terms due to adjustments in service content and changes in relevant regulations.

section2.title: 2. Service Description
section2.content: The Quote24 service is designed to improve your business efficiency, providing the following services:

list.item2: Customer data management and address book

section3.title: 3. Account, Password, and Security
section3.content: When applying for membership, you should provide accurate personal information. You agree and warrant that:

list.item1: Your user account and password for this Service are set by you. Once set, you have the obligation to properly manage and keep them confidential.
list.item2: We will use your account and password to verify your identity. You are responsible for all actions performed through your account and password.
list.item3: To protect your rights, please do not share your account and password with others. We are not responsible for any losses caused by sharing your account and password with others.

section4.title: 4. User Obligations and Commitments
section4.content: Members or non-member users must comply with current laws when using this Service. If you are found to have committed any of the following acts, we may suspend providing services to you:

list.item1: Infringing upon others' reputation, privacy rights, trade secrets, trademarks, copyrights, patents, other intellectual property rights, and other rights.
list.item2: Using the Service under someone else's name or transmitting computer viruses.
list.item3: Engaging in any activities that interfere with or damage the Service (or servers and networks connected to the Service).

section5.title: 5. Subscription and Payment
section5.content: Subscriptions are billed monthly or annually. Monthly and annual plans will automatically renew unless cancelled. You may cancel your subscription at any time, but no refunds will be given for fees already paid. Prices may be adjusted with advance notice to users. Payment information is processed by third-party payment service providers, and we do not store complete payment information.

section6.title: 6. Intellectual Property Rights
section6.content: User-generated content belongs to the user. Quote24 retains ownership of the platform and services. Users must ensure that content produced using this Service does not infringe upon others' intellectual property rights.

section7.title: 7. Service Limitations and Disclaimer
section7.content: This Service is provided "as is" without any express or implied warranties. We do not guarantee that the service will be uninterrupted or error-free, and are not responsible for indirect losses. To the maximum extent permitted by law, we are not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from use or inability to use this System.

section8.title: 8. Contact Us
section8.content: If you have any questions about the Terms of Service, please contact us at: Email: service@quote24.cc. The interpretation and application of these Terms of Service, as well as disputes related to these Terms, shall be governed by the laws of the Republic of China (Taiwan), and the Taipei District Court shall be the court of first instance with exclusive jurisdiction.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.heading: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Our company (Quote24 service provider, hereinafter referred to as "we") appreciates your trust. We highly value the protection of your personal data and comply with privacy protection and relevant laws and regulations including the Personal Data Protection Act. By using the Quote24 service, you acknowledge and agree to be protected by this policy.

section1.title: 1. Personal Data and Other Information We Collect
section1.content: When you register as a member, we collect the following data:

list.item1: Registration information: login name and email address
list.item2: Third-party login information: if you register using Google, we will collect your name, profile picture, email address, etc.
list.item3: Business data: customer information, quotation content, product/service data, payment records
list.item4: Technical data: URL, IP address, browser type, operating system data, language, visit time and location, etc.

section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
section2.content: The personal data we collect will be used for the following services:

list.item1: Identifying member identity, contacting you, completing transactions, sending receipts, providing services, or related update notifications
list.item2: Using your personal data to send newsletters and occasional marketing activity notifications
list.item3: Improving services, developing new services, communicating with members, including internal auditing, research, and analysis
list.item4: We will not use your personal data for purposes not specified in this policy unless there are additional needs and your written consent is obtained

section3.title: 3. How You Can Use Your Information
section3.content: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:

list.item1: Access and View: You can query, view, change, update, or copy your personal data by logging into the system
list.item2: Termination and Deletion: You can request to terminate use or delete your personal data; however, once terminated or deleted, you will no longer be able to use this Service
list.item3: Right to Refuse: If your request to change, update, or delete your personal data may harm major national interests, hinder government agencies from performing legal duties, or harm major interests of third parties, we have the right to refuse your request

section4.title: 4. Personal Data Security
section4.content: We take the following measures to protect your data security:

list.item1: Data encryption transmission (SSL/TLS), secure database storage, and regular security audits
list.item2: We only store your personal data for the purposes stated above. Therefore, we will delete your personal data when you terminate the use of the Service
list.item3: You agree that when using this Service, the data you provide and use is legal, does not infringe upon third-party rights, violate third-party agreements, or involve any illegal activities

section5.title: 5. Third-Party Services
section5.content: This System uses the following third-party services:

list.item2: Cloudflare - Website hosting and CDN services

list.item3: Analyze website traffic and improve user experience

section7.title: 7. Privacy Policy Amendments and Effectiveness
section7.content: We will update this policy from time to time in compliance with local privacy protection and personal data protection laws. When we make significant changes, we will announce them on the official website. This Privacy and Personal Data Protection Policy constitutes part of the Terms of Service. If you do not agree with any terms or changes to this policy, please stop using this Service immediately.

section8.title: 8. Contact Us
section8.content: If you have any questions about our privacy or personal data protection policy, please contact us at: Email: service@quote24.cc

faq.q1: Can I upgrade or downgrade anytime?
faq.a1: Yes, you can upgrade to a higher plan at any time, and it takes effect immediately. Downgrades will take effect at the end of the current billing cycle.
faq.q2: Can I get a refund for annual plans?
faq.a2: Annual plans can be fully refunded within 14 days of purchase. After 14 days, refunds are prorated based on the remaining time.
faq.q3: Are there usage limits for AI analysis?
faq.a3: AI analysis features have monthly usage limits. Cash flow analysis: 20/month, Receivable risk: 10/month, Tax optimization: 5/month.
faq.q4: How do I cancel my subscription?
faq.a4: You can cancel your subscription at any time from the settings page. After cancellation, your account will be downgraded to Free at the end of the current billing cycle.
